comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: www.cwgc.org.uk has ALEXANDER, KEITH Rank:Private Service No:26607 Date of Death:20/09/1916 Age:29 Regiment/Service:Yorkshire Regiment 9th Bn. Panel Reference Pier and Face 3 A and 3 D. Memorial THIEPVAL MEMORIAL Additional Information: Son of George and Elizabeth Alexander, of Marton, Middlesbrough, Yorks.

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: At the time of the 1911 census Keith was a Draper's Shop Assistant living at Craigellon, Marton in Cleveland. His parents appear to have been away from the home on census night.

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Geo Alexander was a draper's assistant, 18 Church St (Post Office, professions and trades for MIDDLESBROUGH in Bulmer's Directory of 1890) The Yorkshire Regiment was known as Alexandra, The Princess of Wales's Own Yorkshire Regiment - unofficially, The Green Howards. In 1921 it became officially known as The Green Howards (Alexandra, Princess of Wales's Own Yorkshire Regiment). The badge visible on Private Alexander's cap is seen here at the top of the Yorkshire Regiment's web site www.ww1-yorkshires.org.uk/ 9th (Service) Battalion: raised September 1914: on Western Front from August 1915, moved to Italy in November 1917, returned to France in September 1918. The Roll of Honour is kept in the parish church in Richmond, North Yorkshire.

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Keith Alexander is commemorated on the Middlesbrough War Memorial. 'The Keith Alexander Cup also was presented for the first time in 1929 by the Mayor and Mayoress in memory of their son who attended Middlesbrough High School from 1901 to 1904, and died aged 29 at the Battle of the Somme.' www.mbro.ac.uk/Home//index/collegeinfo/collegehistory/wer... Middlesbrough High School A bench at Newham Grange Farm was carved from oak by Keith Alexander, it was originally part of an art project about the wildlife on Marton West Beck www.hidden-teesside.co.uk/2012/06/13/birdman-seat-newham-... [Captain James Cook (1728 – 1779) was born in Marton]
